references: Related: CF 278856, CF 277484, CF 278856. Amending: Ord 103094.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the agreement with the Seattle-King County Legal Aid Bureau authorized by Ordinance 103094; amending Section 1 of said ordinance to authorize deduction of the cost of auditing and monitoring the performance of the contractor; and for such purpose increasing the expenditure allowance for Object of Expenditure "3000 Other Services and Charges" Program Category "Management Services" (Code 220) in the 1974 Budget of the Department of Human Resources by reappropriation and transfer.
